name: TaDaweb
description: The TaDaweb Creator lets you create advanced web recipes. A web recipe can be compared to an automatic process that collects, transforms, and combines information. They are quick and easy to create because they are based on human, rather than computer logic. Recipes can be created by users, with TaDaweb also providing the option to create recipes on demand.
